countries.name: Canada
countries.notes: AI checklist supports tourist and student only. Uses LOA terminology (not I-20). Work visa exists in DB but no AI/knowledge base support.

countries.notes: AI checklist supports tourist and student only. Work visa exists in DB but no AI/knowledge base support.

incompleteCountries.name: United Arab Emirates
incompleteCountries.issue: In database but missing knowledge base entries. Will use generic AI fallback.

unsupportedVisaTypes.issue: Work visas exist in database for all 8 countries, but AI checklist generation only supports 'tourist' and 'student'. Work visa applications will not get AI-generated checklists.

documentGuides.notes: Document guides are generic (Uzbekistan-specific) and not country-specific. They are used for all countries.
